# A blackish-brown pill used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] "to remedy epidemic infectious diseases and counteract toxicity in the treatment of epidemic infectious diseases marked by chills, fever, headache, thirst, dryness of the throat with no sweat, mumps, and erysipelas of the face".
